DzDropButton Class Reference
[Interface Components]

A button that displays a drop arrow, like a QComboBox, that can be used to display a popup menu or some other custom widget when pressed. More...

#include <dzdropbutton.h>

Detailed Description

A button that displays a drop arrow, like a QComboBox, that can be used to display a popup menu or some other custom widget when pressed.
